short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily remove videos you're no longer interested in or have already watched from your Watch Later playlist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:
* Automatic Removal: You can choose to automatically remove videos you’ve watched past a specified percentage.
* Manual Review: You can choose to review each video one at a time. Removing videos in this mode takes one keypress instead of multiple mouse movements and clicks.

How It Works:
* Auto-Remove Settings: Set a watched percentage threshold to automatically remove videos you’ve mostly watched.
* Manual Review Settings: For videos below the threshold, you can choose to manually review and decide or you can automatically keep them.
* Process Your Playlist: Click the “Start Processing” button to begin managing your playlist. Videos meeting your auto-remove criteria are handled automatically, while others await your decision.

Permissions:
This extension requires access to your YouTube Watch Later playlist to function correctly. No data is shared outside your browser.
